title: Rawlicious - Ottawa
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Opened Apr 2016 this raw food restaurant in Centretown provides an organic and vegan menu. Features raw appetizers, soups, salads, raw entrees and desserts plus smoothies and fresh juices. No wheat, dairy, or refined sugar. Casual-nice modern interior with artwork display. Inside is also a small retail section with some raw essentials.
